com.resistance.theresistance.logic

Class Mission

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.resistance.theresistance.logic.Mission

  • public class Mission
extends java.lang.Object
    Mission class is in charge of all things mission related. Keeps track of the mission number, creates the Mission Leader, keeps track of mission history, etc.

               int missionNum,
               java.util.ArrayList<Round> stateHistory)
        Creates a mission object

        missionLeader - the object for the leader of the mission, in charge of choosing missionaries

        public boolean isApproved()
        Checks if the mission is approved
        Returns:
